file_content.text: Beke's got good men, but they're not fighters like you and me. They'll need your help to retake the city.
Enter Sobrik through the main gates. Fight through the Empire and make your way to the spaceport from there.
The resistance looks up to you. Keep them going 'til I get there.
Those men need a leader.
I won't lose Sobrik. Not this time.
Do what you can to keep those civilians alive.
Take command, Colonel.
There won't be any foolish bravado on my watch.
Use your double agent status to help us.
You should distract them.
The greatest double agent in the world couldn't make the Empire ignore a spaceport invasion.
Do you need a rescue?
Are you still undercover?
I'll make my own way to the spaceport. I wouldn't miss this for anything.
This is going to be fun.
No one will get in my way.
Good. Think like the Empire--that's the only way to beat them.
See you inside.
We have control of Sobrik's power grid. Diverting power to the Troida Disruptor. That's it!
Transferring you to Beke Talrott. Sobrik's shield will only be down for a few minutes, so make it quick.
The Troida Disruptor is activated. Sobrik's spaceport shield is breaking down. I can't thank you enough!
You can thank me later. Let's get Sobrik back.
There's no time for that now.
Could have done that blind.
I hope you feel as confident about invading Sobrik, because that's next.
Any other errands you'd like me to run?
When does this get exciting?
You'll be the hero of Balmorra when we win Sobrik, I promise you.
I'm impressed. Those garrisons were tough, and I should know--I was forced to design them.
[This power generator will not respond to your commands.]
